text: The Dujiangyan Phoenix Stadium () is a multi-purpose stadium in Dujiangyan, Sichuan, China. It is currently used mostly for association football matches. The stadium holds 12,700 people. The venue broke ground in February 2008 with original name Dujiangyan Sports Centre Stadium. It opened in May 2010 with a new name "Phoenix", which was in memory of the city rebirth from 2008 Sichuan earthquake.为了这穿越古今的旅行，成都等了整整30年！ ==References== Category:Football venues in China Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in China Category:Athletics (track and field) venues in China Category:2010 establishments in China Category:Buildings and structures in Chengdu Category:Sport in Chengdu Category:Sports venues in Sichuan Category:Sports venues completed in 2010
title: Dujiangyan Phoenix Stadium
